net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources
Class PackageFragmentRootMetrics

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources.AbstractMetricSource
      net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources.PackageFragmentRootMetrics
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, IGraphContributor, java.io.Serializable
public class PackageFragmentRootMetrics
extends AbstractMetricSource
implements IGraphContributor

initialize package fragment metrics (my children) and collect all results from the calculators for the package root level

Author:
Frank Sauer
